product_overview: Kademe Kalite Yönetim Sistemi is a comprehensive web-based quality management system tailored for automotive manufacturing. It enables real-time monitoring of quality metrics, deviation and quarantine management, non-conformity handling with DF and 8D methodologies, equipment calibration tracking, supplier and internal audits, KPI visualization, cost management, continuous improvement via Kaizen, and robust reporting with PDF export, all secured by role-based access control and synchronized data.
core_goals: Enable tracking and management of quality deviations and non-conformities
Manage quarantined parts and materials effectively
Implement corrective and preventive action workflows (DF and 8D)
Conduct supplier quality audits and performance tracking
Plan and execute internal audits with findings management
Track and promote continuous improvement initiatives (Kaizen)
Analyze and report on quality costs and key performance indicators (KPIs)
Support incoming quality control for material inspections
Provide comprehensive document management with PDF support
Facilitate task assignments and employee training tracking
Ensure data security and role-based access control
Deliver real-time data synchronization and intuitive dashboards
key_features: Dashboard with real-time quality statistics, KPIs, and interactive charts
Complete deviation management with filtering, analytics, and approval workflows
Quarantine management including decision tracking and analytics
Non-Conformity management supporting DF, 8D, and MDI forms with workflow tracking
Equipment registry with calibration and maintenance history
Supplier quality audit management and performance metrics
Internal audit planning, execution, and findings tracking
Kaizen continuous improvement initiative tracking with status workflows
Quality cost management covering material, personnel, and unit costs
Incoming quality control with inspection records and defect tracking
Vehicle tracking with production and quality metrics
Document management with upload, version control, and PDF viewing
Report generation with dynamic PDF export capabilities
Authentication via Supabase with role-based access control and secure session management
Reusable UI components styled with TailwindCSS and enhanced accessibility
user_flow_summary: User logs in and accesses main dashboard presenting quality KPIs and summary cards
User navigates to Deviation Management to create, filter, and analyze deviations, with ability to drill down in charts and create NC forms from deviations
User manages quarantined parts by logging quarantine details, making decisions (release, scrap, rework), and reviewing quarantine analytics
User creates and progresses DF, 8D, or MDI non-conformity forms through multi-step workflows with approver assignments
User tracks equipment status and calibration history, scheduling maintenance as needed
User plans and executes supplier audits capturing audit findings and corrective action tracking
User performs internal audits with planning, execution, finding documentation, and report generation
User files Kaizen improvement suggestions, tracks status, assigns owners, and monitors implementation progress
User handles quality cost inputs and monitors cost analysis reports
User conducts incoming quality inspections and manages acceptance or rejection of materials
User manages vehicle records and monitors associated quality data
User uploads, views, and manages quality documents with PDF support
User generates custom PDF reports for various modules and exports them
User navigates the system with responsive UI components and receives real-time updates and notifications
validation_criteria: All modules load without errors and display data correctly
Filters work as expected across all data views
Charts render interactively and support drill-down functionality
PDF export and report generation produce accurate, complete documents
Real-time updates synchronize data without delay
Authentication enforces role-based access and secures sessions
Form validations enforce required fields, data formats, and prevent duplicates
UI responsiveness on multiple device sizes with no layout breakage
Toast notifications display for success, error, and information states
System handles large datasets efficiently with pagination and caching
Network errors are managed gracefully with user feedback
Performance meets defined benchmarks for load and chart rendering
